title: Assuring the Security of the State of Qatar
summary: The document is an executive order titled 'Assuring the Security of the State of Qatar' issued on September 29, 2025. It reaffirms the United States' commitment to Qatar's security and territorial integrity, recognizing Qatar as a steadfast ally. The order states that any armed attack on Qatar will be considered a threat to U.S. peace and security, prompting a response that may include military action. It also outlines contingency planning and diplomatic efforts to support Qatar, with the Secretary of War, Secretary of State, and Director of National Intelligence playing key roles. The order emphasizes the importance of joint efforts with allies and partners to ensure Qatar's security and stability.
